comments:
I-build 0506, winXP

I have been running this build successfully, but today I was trying to enable 
Automatic Updates (Window>Preferences>Install/Update>Automatic Updates) on 
startup, so I restarted after I enabled it.
I know updating will fail, as I could not connect to the update site before. 
However, the workbench did not get restored to its original layout (I think I 
was in the Java Browse perspective, and had a couple of others - Team, Java, 
Debug - open).

Here is the log:
